generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the edge of the road, separated by a curb.
- building: A large, multi-story building with glass windows and a modern architectural design is visible in the background.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the roadside and in front of the building.
- terrain: Grass and some soil are visible in the median strip between lanes.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the distance.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road and parked along the side.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible at the intersection ahead.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign is visible on a pole near the traffic light.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic lights and signs.
- fence: A fence is visible along the side of the road, separating the sidewalk from the grass.
